definitions.text: affected manners intended to impress others
examples: don't put on airs with me

definitions.text: a posture assumed by models for photographic or artistic purposes
a deliberate pretense or exaggerated display
assume a posture as for artistic purposes
examples: We don't know the woman who posed for Leonardo so often

definitions.text: pretend to be someone you are not; sometimes with fraudulent intentions
examples: She posed as the Czar's daughter

definitions.text: behave affectedly or unnaturally in order to impress others
examples: Don't pay any attention to him--he is always posing to impress his peers!
She postured and made a total fool of herself

definitions.text: put into a certain place or abstract location
examples: Set the dogs on the scent of the missing children
Place emphasis on a certain point

definitions.text: be a mystery or bewildering to
examples: Got me--I don't know the answer!
